title: Queensland
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Queensland - Description and travel
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
description: Episode of Series "Holiday". Beginning with Brisbane's elegant houses, this Queensland travel video also moves inland and along the expansive coastline. Enjoy the recreational activities on Hamilton Island, join a backpack tour that includes scuba diving, bush walking and horse riding, experience the Stockman's Hall of Fame and the waterhole which inspired the Waltzing Matilda legend, visit the beaches of Surfer's Paradise and Noosa, kayak in the Daintree Forest or sail to tranquil locations in the Whitsuday Islands.
